name: MILK
description:
Here is a little point and click game about large scale milk production and the collateral damage it causes. 

Today intensive milk production multiplies unnecessary animal abuse. 

MILK treats the matter with a trashy, quirky and ironic humor that can sometimes be nauseating.

Today we go to visit the farm. 

The program includes artificial insemination, milking and slaughter.  Come and have fun with animals.

A game for young and old to learn while having fun.

Languages :

WARNING, THIS GAME CONTAINS IMAGES THAT MAY HURT THE SENSITIVITY OF SOME PEOPLE
